NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color> Clue: There is another QM locator on BH and you can learn to use the rule of imaging from afar there?
1
SOLANUM: Ilex, it is good to see you today!
2
1
SOLANUM: You have my deepest gratitude for coming all this way to <color=lightblue>Ember Twin</color> today to assist me.
3 2
ILEX: It is no matter, Solanum. I am glad to be of assistance!
4
3
ILEX: However, I was curious: was there a reason we needed to travel to <color=lightblue>Ember Twin</color> today?
5
4
ILEX: After all, there is already a <color=orange>Quantum Moon Locator</color> back on <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow,</color> is there not? Could it not have served the same purpose we require?
6
5
SOLANUM: That is a wise question, my friend.. I'm afraid in my eagerness, I had not even thought to question Bells' instructions!
7
6
SOLANUM: I shall be returning to <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color> shortly to begin my expedition.
8
7
SOLANUM: If time allows, I shall try to visit the <color=orange>Quantum Moon Locator</color> on <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color> to inquire Bells about this!
BH_QML R1 5
R_SLR R3 5
BH_QML R2 5
BH_QML R3 8
